seo.title: Home | Accommodation and Pottery Workshop Habartovi
seo.description: Welcome to the website of our Accommodation and Ceramic Workshop in Moravský Karlov, near Červená Voda. The location offers many sports opportunities and relaxation.

hero.title: Accommodation and Ceramic Workshop Habartovi
hero.subtitle: A house with a large garden surrounded by forest offers you close contact with nature. Exchange the daily rush for a moment of pause and embrace the natural rhythms.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Welcome to our website
about.text: Rural-style living in a historic house with a ceramic workshop, where you can try being a potter for a while.

zdenekAndHelena.ZdenekText: A man with a heart, a lifelong seeker of joy.
zdenekAndHelena.HelenaText: I discovered ceramics when I was twenty. It is a beautiful craft that drew me in at a time when I was searching for my place in the world. Working with wet clay awakens my imagination and love for nature.

accommodation.title: Private Accommodation in Nature
accommodation.description: We offer stylish accommodation in two attic apartments of a spacious historic estate, built at the turn of the 18th and 19th centuries.

ceramicsWorkshop.title: Ceramic Workshop
ceramicsWorkshop.description: Visit our pottery workshop, where ceramics for the home and garden are made. We also offer custom-made creations according to your wishes. Our workshop welcomes anyone who would like to try working with clay – modeling, wheel throwing, and relaxing creative activities.
